ARP Digital GATE API
ARP Digital GATE API

Endpointhttps://platform.arpdigital.io/services/gate/api/v1

Health check

GET
https://platform.arpdigital.io/services/gate/api/v1
/health

Check the health status of the GATE service

Health check › Responses

200

Service is healthy

status
string
service
string
redis
string
GET/health
curl --request GET \
  --url https://platform.arpdigital.io/services/gate/api/v1/health
shell
Example Responses
{
  "status": "ok",
  "service": "gate",
  "redis": "up"
}
json
application/json

List checkouts

GET
https://platform.arpdigital.io/services/gate/api/v1
/checkout

Retrieve a list of checkouts

List checkouts › query Parameters

page
integer

Page number for pagination

Default: 1
pageSize
integer

Number of checkouts per page

Default: 10
search
string

Search query to filter checkouts by ID, External Checkout ID, or External Client ID

status
string

Filter checkouts by their status

List checkouts › Headers

X-API-Key
string · required

Your API key

X-Timestamp
integer · required

Current Unix timestamp in seconds

X-Signature
string · required

HMAC SHA256 signature of apiKey + requestBody + timestamp using your API secret

X-Environment
string · enum · required

Environment where the request is executed

Enum values:
sandbox
production

List checkouts › Responses

200

List of checkouts with detailed information and pagination metadata.

success
boolean
object
GET/checkout
curl --request GET \
  --url https://platform.arpdigital.io/services/gate/api/v1/checkout \
  --header 'X-API-Key: <string>' \
  --header 'X-Environment: <string>' \
  --header 'X-Signature: <string>' \
  --header 'X-Timestamp: <number>'
shell

{
  "success": true,
  "data": {
    "checkouts": [

application/json

Create checkout

POST
https://platform.arpdigital.io/services/gate/api/v1
/checkout

Create a new checkout session

Create checkout › Headers

X-API-Key
string · required

Your API key

X-Timestamp
integer · required

Current Unix timestamp in seconds

X-Signature
string · required

HMAC SHA256 signature of apiKey + requestBody + timestamp using your API secret

X-Environment
string · enum · required

Specifies the environment to use (sandbox or production). This determines which database the API interacts with.

Enum values:
sandbox
production
Default: sandbox

Create checkout › Request Body

oneOf
Exactly one variant must match.

Decision Table

VariantMatching Criteria
type = object · requires: fromCurrencyId, externalClientId, externalCheckoutId +1 more
type = object · requires: fromCryptocurrencyId, externalClientId, externalCheckoutId +1 more
Properties for Variant 1:
externalClientId
string · required

Identifier for the client creating the checkout.

externalCheckoutId
string · required

External reference for the checkout.

fromAmount
number · required

Amount to convert or process.

fromCurrencyId
string | null · required

FIAT currency ID. Required if 'fromCryptocurrencyId' is not provided.

successUrl
string | null

Users will be redirected to this URL after a successfully completed transaction.

vaultId
string | null

Optional vault ID linked to the checkout.

fromCryptocurrencyId
string | null

Cryptocurrency ID. Required if 'fromCurrencyId' is not provided.

Create checkout › Responses

200

Checkout created successfully

success
boolean
object
message
string
POST/checkout
curl --request POST \
  --url https://platform.arpdigital.io/services/gate/api/v1/checkout \
  --header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  --header 'X-API-Key: <string>' \
  --header 'X-Environment: sandbox' \
  --header 'X-Signature: <string>' \
  --header 'X-Timestamp: <number>' \
  --data '
{
  "successUrl": {},
  "externalClientId": "externalClientId",
  "externalCheckoutId": "externalCheckoutId",
  "vaultId": {},
  "fromAmount": 0,
  "fromCurrencyId": {},
  "fromCryptocurrencyId": {}
}
'
shell
Example Request Body
{
  "successUrl": {},
  "externalClientId": "externalClientId",
  "externalCheckoutId": "externalCheckoutId",
  "vaultId": {},
  "fromAmount": 0,
  "fromCurrencyId": {},
  "fromCryptocurrencyId": {}
}
json
Example Responses
{
  "success": true,
  "data": {
    "checkoutId": "checkoutId",
    "checkoutUrl": "checkoutUrl"
  },
  "message": "Checkout created successfully"
}
json
application/json

Create broker checkout

POST
https://platform.arpdigital.io/services/gate/api/v1
/checkout/broker

Create a new broker checkout session

Create broker checkout › Headers

X-API-Key
string · required

Your API key

X-Timestamp
integer · required

Current Unix timestamp in seconds

X-Signature
string · required

HMAC SHA256 signature of apiKey + requestBody + timestamp using your API secret

X-Environment
string · enum · required

Environment where the request is executed

Enum values:
sandbox
production

Create broker checkout › Request Body

oneOf
Exactly one variant must match.

Decision Table

VariantMatching Criteria
type = object · requires: fromCurrencyId, externalClientId, externalCheckoutId +1 more
type = object · requires: fromCryptocurrencyId, externalClientId, externalCheckoutId +1 more
Properties for Variant 1:
externalClientId
string · required

Identifier for the client creating the checkout.

externalCheckoutId
string · required

External reference for the checkout.

fromAmount
number · required

Amount to convert or process.

fromCurrencyId
string | null · required

FIAT currency ID. Required if 'fromCryptocurrencyId' is not provided.

fromCryptocurrencyId
string | null

Cryptocurrency ID. Required if 'fromCurrencyId' is not provided.

buyerKyc
boolean | null

Require the buyer to complete KYC verification.

sellerKyc
boolean | null

Require the seller to complete KYC verification.

Create broker checkout › Responses

200

Checkout created successfully

success
boolean
object
message
string
POST/checkout/broker
curl --request POST \
  --url https://platform.arpdigital.io/services/gate/api/v1/checkout/broker \
  --header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  --header 'X-API-Key: <string>' \
  --header 'X-Environment: <string>' \
  --header 'X-Signature: <string>' \
  --header 'X-Timestamp: <number>' \
  --data '
{
  "externalClientId": "externalClientId",
  "externalCheckoutId": "externalCheckoutId",
  "fromAmount": 0,
  "fromCurrencyId": {},
  "fromCryptocurrencyId": {},
  "buyerKyc": {},
  "sellerKyc": {}
}
'
shell
Example Request Body
{
  "externalClientId": "externalClientId",
  "externalCheckoutId": "externalCheckoutId",
  "fromAmount": 0,
  "fromCurrencyId": {},
  "fromCryptocurrencyId": {},
  "buyerKyc": {},
  "sellerKyc": {}
}
json
Example Responses
{
  "success": true,
  "data": {
    "checkoutId": "checkoutId",
    "buyerUrl": "buyerUrl",
    "sellerUrl": "sellerUrl"
  },
  "message": "Checkout created successfully"
}
json
application/json

https://platform.arpdigital.io/services/gate/api/v1

string · required

string · required

Your API key

X-Timestamp
integer · required

Current Unix timestamp in seconds

X-Signature
string · required

HMAC SHA256 signature of apiKey + requestBody + timestamp using your API secret

X-Environment
string · enum · required

Enum values:
sandbox
production

Get checkout › Responses

200

Checkout details

success
boolean
object
GET/checkout/{checkoutId}
curl --request GET \
  --url https://platform.arpdigital.io/services/gate/api/v1/checkout/:checkoutId \
  --header 'X-API-Key: <string>' \
  --header 'X-Environment: <string>' \
  --header 'X-Signature: <string>' \
  --header 'X-Timestamp: <number>'
shell

{
  "success": true,
  "data": {
    "checkout": {
      "id": "id",

      "toCurrencyId": {},
      "toCryptocurrencyId": {},

      "conversionRate": "conversionRate",
      "feeRate": {},

      "checkoutType": "checkoutType",
      "successUrl": {},
      "orgLogoUrl": {},
      "orgDisclaimer": {},
      "vaultId": {},
      "vaultWalletId": {},
      "orgId": "orgId",
      "createdByUserId": "createdByUserId",
      "createdAt": "2024-08-25T15:00:00Z",
      "updatedAt": "2024-08-25T15:00:00Z",
      "expiresAt": "2024-08-25T15:00:00Z",
      "pennyTest": {
        "amount": "amount",
        "status": "status",
        "createdAt": "2024-08-25T15:00:00Z",
        "updatedAt": "2024-08-25T15:00:00Z"
      },
      "vaultWallet": {},
      "transactions": [
        {
          "id": "id",
          "checkoutId": "checkoutId",

          "fromCurrencyId": "fromCurrencyId",
          "fromCryptocurrencyId": {},

          "toCurrencyId": {},

          "status": "status",
          "orgId": "orgId",
          "createdAt": "2024-08-25T15:00:00Z",
          "updatedAt": "2024-08-25T15:00:00Z"

      "fromCryptocurrency": {

Get buyer checkout

GET
https://platform.arpdigital.io/services/gate/api/v1
/checkout/buyer/{checkoutId}

Retrieve checkout details for the buyer

Get buyer checkout › path Parameters

checkoutId
string · required

Checkout ID

Get buyer checkout › Headers

X-Environment
string · enum · required

Environment where the request is executed

Enum values:
sandbox
production

Get buyer checkout › Responses

200

Returns checkout details. If buyer KYC is required, returns minimal details. Otherwise, returns full checkout object including optional QR code data.

oneOf
Exactly one variant must match.

Decision Table

VariantMatching Criteria
type = object
type = object
Properties for Variant 1:
Buyer KYC is required
success
boolean
object
GET/checkout/buyer/{checkoutId}
curl --request GET \
  --url https://platform.arpdigital.io/services/gate/api/v1/checkout/buyer/:checkoutId \
  --header 'X-Environment: <string>'
shell
Example Responses
{
  "success": true,
  "data": {
    "checkout": {
      "id": "id",
      "orgDisclaimer": {},
      "orgLogoUrl": {}
    },
    "kycEnabled": true,
    "kycTarget": "kycTarget",
    "kycStatus": "kycStatus"
  }
}
json
application/json

Complete checkout

POST
https://platform.arpdigital.io/services/gate/api/v1
/checkout/complete

Proceed to complete checkout

Complete checkout › Headers

X-Environment
string · enum · required

Environment where the request is executed

Enum values:
sandbox
production

Complete checkout › Request Body

checkoutId
string

The ID of the checkout to complete

toCryptocurrencyId
string

The ID of the cryptocurrency that will be used to complete the checkout

Complete checkout › Responses

200

Checkout completed successfully

success
boolean
object
message
string
POST/checkout/complete
curl --request POST \
  --url https://platform.arpdigital.io/services/gate/api/v1/checkout/complete \
  --header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  --header 'X-Environment: <string>' \
  --data '
{
  "checkoutId": "checkoutId",
  "toCryptocurrencyId": "toCryptocurrencyId"
}
'
shell
Example Request Body
{
  "checkoutId": "checkoutId",
  "toCryptocurrencyId": "toCryptocurrencyId"
}
json
Example Responses
{
  "success": true,
  "data": {
    "checkoutId": "checkoutId",
    "address": "address",
    "toAmount": "toAmount",
    "expiresAt": "2024-08-25T15:00:00Z",
    "cancelledCheckoutsCount": 0
  },
  "message": "Checkout completed successfully"
}
json
application/json

Create penny test

POST
https://platform.arpdigital.io/services/gate/api/v1

Create penny test › Headers

X-Environment
string · enum · required

Environment where the request is executed

Enum values:
sandbox
production

Create penny test › Request Body

checkoutId
string · required

The ID of the checkout to run the penny test against

amount
number · required

Amount to test (in units of the chosen cryptocurrency)

200

Penny test completed successfully

success
boolean
object
message
string

  --url https://platform.arpdigital.io/services/gate/api/v1/checkout/penny-test \
  --header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  --header 'X-Environment: <string>' \
  --data '
{
  "checkoutId": "checkoutId",
  "amount": 0
}
'
shell

{
  "checkoutId": "checkoutId",
  "amount": 0
}
json

  "success": true,
  "data": {

      "id": "id",
      "checkoutId": "checkoutId",
      "amount": "amount",
      "status": "status",
      "orgId": "orgId",
      "createdAt": "2024-08-25T15:00:00Z",
      "updatedAt": "2024-08-25T15:00:00Z"
    },
    "qrCodeData": {
      "qrUrl": "qrUrl",
      "qrCode": "qrCode",
      "decimals": 0,
      "amountInBaseUnits": "amountInBaseUnits"
    }
  },

https://platform.arpdigital.io/services/gate/api/v1
/vaults

Create vaults and wallets › Headers

X-API-Key
string · required

Your API key

X-Timestamp
integer · required

Current Unix timestamp in seconds

X-Signature
string · required

HMAC SHA256 signature of apiKey + requestBody + timestamp using your API secret

X-Environment
string · enum · required

Specifies the environment to use (sandbox or production). This determines which database the API interacts with.

Enum values:
sandbox
production
Default: sandbox

Create vaults and wallets › Request Body

vaultName
string · required

Create vaults and wallets › Responses

200

Vaults and wallets created successfully

success
boolean · required
object · required
POST/vaults
curl --request POST \
  --url https://platform.arpdigital.io/services/gate/api/v1/vaults \
  --header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  --header 'X-API-Key: <string>' \
  --header 'X-Environment: sandbox' \
  --header 'X-Signature: <string>' \
  --header 'X-Timestamp: <number>' \
  --data '
{
  "vaultName": "vaultName"
}
'
shell
Example Request Body
{
  "vaultName": "vaultName"
}
json
Example Responses
{
  "success": true,
  "data": {
    "vault": {
      "id": "id",
      "vaultName": "vaultName",
      "vaultAccountId": "vaultAccountId",
      "name": "name",
      "hiddenOnUI": true,
      "autoFuel": true,
      "customCreated": true,
      "orgId": "orgId",
      "createdByUserId": "createdByUserId",
      "createdAt": "2024-08-25T15:00:00Z",
      "updatedAt": "2024-08-25T15:00:00Z"
    },
    "wallets": [
      {
        "id": "id",
        "vaultId": "vaultId",
        "cryptocurrencyId": "cryptocurrencyId",
        "address": "address",
        "status": "status",
        "lockedUntil": "2024-08-25T15:00:00Z",
        "orgId": "orgId",
        "createdAt": "2024-08-25T15:00:00Z",
        "updatedAt": "2024-08-25T15:00:00Z"
      }
    ],
    "message": "Successfully created vault and 1 wallets"
  }
}

application/json

Get detailed vaults

GET
https://platform.arpdigital.io/services/gate/api/v1
/vaults/detailed

Retrieve detailed information about vaults

Get detailed vaults › query Parameters

page
integer

Page number for pagination

Default: 1
pageSize
integer

Number of checkouts per page

Default: 10
search
string

Search query to filter vaults by ID, name, or account ID

Get detailed vaults › Headers

X-API-Key
string · required

Your API key

X-Timestamp
integer · required

Current Unix timestamp in seconds

X-Signature
string · required

HMAC SHA256 signature of apiKey + requestBody + timestamp using your API secret

X-Environment
string · enum · required

Environment where the request is executed

Enum values:
sandbox
production

Get detailed vaults › Responses

200

Vaults retrieved successfully

success
boolean
object
message
string
GET/vaults/detailed
curl --request GET \
  --url https://platform.arpdigital.io/services/gate/api/v1/vaults/detailed \
  --header 'X-API-Key: <string>' \
  --header 'X-Environment: <string>' \
  --header 'X-Signature: <string>' \
  --header 'X-Timestamp: <number>'
shell

  "success": true,
  "data": {
    "vaults": [
      {
        "id": "id",

        "name": "name",

        "autoFuel": true,
        "customCreated": true,
        "orgId": "orgId",
        "createdByUserId": "createdByUserId",

        "updatedAt": "2024-08-25T15:00:00Z",

            "id": "id",

            "cryptocurrencyId": "cryptocurrencyId",
            "address": "address",
            "status": "status",
            "lockedUntil": "2024-08-25T15:00:00Z",
            "orgId": "orgId",

            "cryptocurrency": {
              "id": "id",
              "symbol": "symbol",

          {}
